My name is Andras. I write code. I live in London but I’m not a stranger in Budapest too, and might be able to appear in a few places. Including online places because I’m a web developer and I share some of my work, I like to and would like to contribute in many places.

This is my portfolio page where I share what I could find available, and I’m always looking for new projects.

Portfolio

Very clickable in my imagination, let’s add some content!
